Not infrequently I make presentations. Although not everything will be made available here, I'll try to update this page as these things happen. The included items are intended for those who attended the presentation; because my PowerPoint notes tend to be very sketchy at best, if you didn't attend you might need to [contact](connect.qmd) me to understand just exactly what I was talking about.
